== Story ==
{{VO/Story
|character           = Kuki Shinobu
|language            = ko
|name                = 쿠키 시노부

|vo_01_01_title      = 첫 만남…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 안녕, 난 아라타키파의 이인자 쿠키 시노부야. 우린 물류 배송, 치안 유지, 자택 보수, 음악 공연 등 다양한 의뢰를 받고 있어. 필요하면 언제든지 연락해. 자, 이건 내 명함이니까 받아둬
|vo_01_01_rm         = Annyeong, nan Aratakipa-ui i'inja Kuki Sinobuya. Urin mullyu baesong, chian yuji, jataek bosu, eumak gong'yeon deung dayanghan uiroereul batgo isseo. Piryohamyeon eonjedeunji yeonrakhae. Ja, igeon nae myeonghaminikka badadwo.
|vo_01_01_tl         = Hi, I am the second-in-command of the Arataki Gang, Kuki Shinobu. We accept diverse requests such as distribution shipping, maintaining public order, repairing houses, and performing music. If you need something, contact me anytime. Here, this is my namecard, have it.

|vo_02_01_title      = 잡담・성가신 일
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: In a Pinch
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - In a Pinch.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = 성가신 일이 생기면 날 찾아와. 내가 해결해 줄게
|vo_02_01_rm         = Seonggasin iri saenggimyeon nal chajawa. Naega haegyeorae julge.
|vo_02_01_tl         = If something troublesome happens, come and find me. I'll solve it.

|vo_02_02_title      = 잡담・자격증
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Certificates
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Certificates.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = 자격증 시험은 다 정해진 평가 기준이 있어. 열심히 배우고 연습하면 무조건 합격할 수 있지. 어렵지 않아
|vo_02_02_rm         = Jagyeokjeung siheomeun da jeonghaejin pyeongga gijuni isseo. Yeolsimhi baeugo yeonseuphamyeon mujogeon hapgyeokhal su itji. Eoryeopji ana.
|vo_02_02_tl         = License exams all have a set evaluation standard. If you learn and practice hard, you can pass no matter what. It's not difficult.

|vo_02_03_title      = 잡담・아라타키파
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: The Arataki Gang
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - The Arataki Gang.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = 아라타키파가 사고 쳤다면, 내가 직접 끌고 와서 사죄시킬게
|vo_02_03_rm         = Aratakipaga sago chyeotdamyeon, naega jikjeop kkeulgo waseo sajoesikilge.
|vo_02_03_tl         = If the Arataki Gang happened to be in an accident, I'll get them myself and make them apologize.

|vo_03_01_title      = 비가 올 때…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = 우산은 됐어, 더 빨리 뛰면 돼
|vo_03_01_rm         = Usaneun dwaesseo, deo ppalli ttwimyeon dwae.
|vo_03_01_tl         = No need for umbrellas, I just need to run faster.

|vo_03_02_title      = 번개가 칠 때…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = 조심해. 이런 날씨에 벼락 맞고 싶은 사람은 없겠지?
|vo_03_02_rm         = Josimhae. Ireon nalssie byeorak matgo sipeun sarameun eopgetji?
|vo_03_02_tl         = Be careful. No one wants to get hit by lightning in this weather, right?

|vo_03_03_title      = 눈이 올 때…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When It Snows
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 얼른 처리하고 가자. 시간 낭비하지 말자고
|vo_03_03_rm         = Eolleun cheorihago gaja. Sigan nangbihaji maljago.
|vo_03_03_tl         = Let's take care of it fast and go. Shouldn't waste time.

|vo_03_04_title      = 햇살이 좋을 때…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When the Sun Is Out
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Sun Is Out.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = 날씨는 좋은데 어쩐지 불길한 예감이 들어…. 괜한 걱정이었으면 좋겠군
|vo_03_04_rm         = Nalssineun joeunde eojjeonji bulgilhan yegami deureo... Gwaenhan geokjeong'ieosseumyeon joketgun.
|vo_03_04_tl         = The weather is nice, but somehow I have an ominous feeling... I hope I'm worried for nothing.

|vo_03_05_title      = 강풍이 불 때…
|vo_03_05_subtitle   = When the Wind Is Blowing
|vo_03_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Wind Is Blowing.ogg
|vo_03_05_tx         = 음… 기분 좋은 바람이야
|vo_03_05_rm         = Eum... gibun joeun baramiya.
|vo_03_05_tl         = Hmm... it's a pleasant breeze.

|vo_04_01_title      = 아침 인사…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = 좋은 아침, 운동하러 가? 생각보다 부지런하네
|vo_04_01_rm         = Joeun achim, undonghareo ga? Saenggakboda bujireonhane.
|vo_04_01_tl         = Good morning, are you going to exercise? You're more diligent than I thought.

|vo_04_02_title      = 점심 인사…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = 뭐 먹고 싶어? 요새 돈 좀 모았거든. 점심은 내가 쏠게
|vo_04_02_rm         = Mwo meokgo sipeo? Yosae don jom moatgeodeun. Jeomsimeun naega ssolge.
|vo_04_02_tl         = Do you want to eat anything? I've been saving some money lately. I'll treat you to lunch.

|vo_04_03_title      = 저녁 인사…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = 어떤 의뢰는 밤에 움직이는 게 더 편해. 그 녀석들한테 맡기는 건 왠지 불안해서 보통 내가 직접 나서지
|vo_04_03_rm         = Eotteon uiroeneun bame umjigineun ge deo pyeonhae. Geu nyeoseokdeulhante matgineun geon waenji buranhaeseo botong naega jikjeop naseoji.
|vo_04_03_tl         = Some requests are more convenient to move around at night. I feel uneasy about leaving it to those, so I usually interfere by myself.

|vo_04_04_title      = 굿나잇…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = 쉬어야 할 땐 가서 푹 쉬어. 내 걱정은 안 해도 돼
|vo_04_04_rm         = Swieoya hal ttaen gaseo puk swieo. Nae geokjeong'eun an haedo dwae.
|vo_04_04_tl         = Go get some rest when you need to. You don't have to worry about me.

|vo_05_01_title      = 쿠키 시노부 자신에 대해・이인자
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}: Gang's Deputy Leader
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Gang's Deputy Leader.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = 일을 찾거나 멤버들의 안정을 유지하는 게 내 할 일이야. 이 외에도&mdash;&mdash;봉행소에서 사람을 빼내거나, 간식과 장난감을 돌려주거나, 의뢰를 받고도 농땡이 피우는 멤버를 잡아내는 등 일을 맡고 있지…. 이 추가 업무들은 아라타키파만의 특색이라고 할 수 있어. 원칙대로라면 다른 조직의 이인자들은 이런 일을 할 필요가 없지. 물론, 나처럼 해낼 수도 없을 테고
|vo_05_01_rm         = Irel chatgeona membeodeure anjeong'eul yujihaneun ge nae hal iriya. I oe'edo &mdash; bonghaengsoeseo sarameul ppaenaegeona, gansikgwa jangnamgameul dollyeojugeona, uirorereul batgodo nongttaeng'i piuneun membeoreul jabananeun deung ireul matgo itji... I chuga eopmudeureun Aratakipamane teuksaegirago hal su isseo. Wonchikdaeroramyeon dareun jojik-ui i'injadeureun ireon ireul hal piryoga eopjji. Mullon, nacheoreom haenael sudo eopsseul tego.
|vo_05_01_tl         = It's my job to find some work or to keep the members stable. In addition to this &mdash; I'm also in charge of taking people out of the Commission Headquarters, returning snacks and toys, or catching members who goofs around even after receiving a commission... I can say that these additional tasks are unique to the Arataki Gang. In principle, second-in-hands of other gangs don't need to do these. Of course, they can't do it like me, too.

|vo_05_02_title      = 쿠키 시노부 자신에 대해・퇴로
|vo_05_02_friendship = 4
|vo_05_02_subtitle   = About {character}: Backup Plan
|vo_05_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Backup Plan.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx         = 아라타키파 해산? 그럴 일은 절대 없어. 그리고 정말 해산한다 해도 난 걱정 안 해. 내가 배를 곯을 리는 없으니까
|vo_05_02_rm         = Aratakipa haesan? Geureol ireun jeoldae eopsseo. Geurigo jeongmal haesanhanda haedo nan geokjeong an hae. Naega bareul goreul rineun eopsseunikka.
|vo_05_02_tl         = Disbandment of the Arataki Gang? It will never happen. And even though it really disbands, I don't have to worry about it. There is no such way I'll starve.

|vo_06_01_title      = 우리에 대해・노트
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Notes
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Notes.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = 나중에 자격증이 따고 싶어지면 날 찾아와. 내 노트를 빌려줄게. 요점 정리는 물론, 보충 설명도 자세하게 적어놔서 이해하기 쉬울 거야
|vo_06_01_rm         = Najung'e jagyeokjeung'i ttago sipeojimyeon nal chajawa. Nae noteureul billyeojulge. Yojeon jeongrineun mullon, bochung seolmyeongdo jasehage jeogeonwaseo ihaehagi swiul geoya.
|vo_06_01_tl         = If you want to get a license later, visit me. I'll lend you my note. It'll be easy to understand, with a detailed explanation as well as key summaries written.

|vo_06_02_title      = 우리에 대해・뒷수습
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Cleaning Up the Mess
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Cleaning Up the Mess.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 네가 아라타키파이든 아니든, 난 널 외부인으로 여기지 않아. 뒷수습은 나한테 맡기고 넌 앞으로 나아가면 돼. 걱정 마, 난 이쪽으로 프로니까 아무리 복잡한 일도 잘 해결할 수 있어. 내 안전이 걱정된다고? 하하, 그것도 걱정 마. 여태까지 겪은 고생이 헛된 건 아니니까
|vo_06_02_rm         = Nega Aratakipaideun anideun, nal neol oebuineuro yeogiji ana. Dwitsuseubeun nahante matgigo neon apeuro na'agamyeon dwae. Geokjeong ma, nan ijjogeuro peuronikka amuri bokjaphan ildo jal haegyeolhal su isseo. Nae anjeoni geokjeongdoendago? Haha, geugeotdo geokjeong ma. Yeotaekkaji gyeokkeun gosaeng'i heotdoen geon aninikka.
|vo_06_02_tl         = Whether you are a part of the Arataki Gang or not, I don't consider you as an outsider. Leave the settlement to me, and you only have to go forward. Don't worry, I'm a pro at this, so I can take care of any complex things. You're worried about my safety? Haha, you don't have to worry about that as well. It's not like all the trouble I've been through is in vain.

|vo_07_01_title      = 「신의 눈」에 대해…
|vo_07_01_friendship = 4
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 자격증과 마찬가지로 이것 또한 내 능력에 대한 인정이자 증명이지. 다른 점이 있다면, 지금까지도 그 심사 기준을 모르겠다는 거?
|vo_07_01_rm         = Jagyeokjeunggwa machangajiro igeot ttohan nae neungryeoge daehan injeong'ija jeungmyeong'iji. Dareun jeomi itdamyeon, jigeumkkajido geu simsa gijuneul moreugetdaneun geo?
|vo_07_01_tl         = This is also an acknowledgement and proof of my ability, such as my licenses. What's different is that I still don't know the judgement criteria?

|vo_07_02_title      = 하고 싶은 이야기・복면
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share: Face Mask
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share - Face Mask.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 복면은 지인한테 들키기 싫어서 쓰는 거야. 특히 아라타키파와 함께 임무를 수행할 때 지인이 날 알아보고 수군거리기라도 한다면, 그 녀석들도 같이 야단법석을 떨 게 분명해…. 생각만 해도 짜증 나네. 그런 일, 두 번 다시 있어선 안 돼! 크흠, 아무것도 아냐
|vo_07_02_rm         = Bokmyeoneun ji'inhante deulkigi sireoseo sseuneun geoya. Teukhi Aratakipawa hamkke immureul suhaenghal ttae ji'ini nal arabogo sugungeorigirado handamyeon, geu nyeoseokdeuldo gachi yadanbeopseogeul tteol ge bunmyeonghae... Saenggakman haedo jjajeung nane. Geureon il, du beon dasi isseoseon an dwae! Keheum, amugeotdo anya.
|vo_07_02_tl         = I wear a mask because I don't want to get caught by an acquaintance. Especially when I'm on a mission with the Arataki Gang, if an acquaintance recognizes me and talks about me, I'm sure those guys will make a fuss together... It's annoying by just thinking about it. That shouldn't happen for a second time! Ehem, nothing.

|vo_07_03_title      = 하고 싶은 이야기・아라타키파 법도
|vo_07_03_friendship = 4
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Something to Share: Gang Bylaws
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share - Gang Bylaws.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = 내가 아라타키파의 「법도」를 만든 이상 다들 법도에 따라 행동해야 돼. 응? 그들이 순순히 말을 듣는 이유가 뭐냐고? 그야 녀석들보다는 내가 훨씬 설득력 있으니까. 내 말과 주먹은 꽤 힘이 있는 편이거든
|vo_07_03_rm         = Naega Aratakipa-ui "Beopdo"reul mandeun isang dadeul beopdoe ttara haengdonghaeya dwae. Eung? Geudeuri sunsunhi mareul deutneun iyuga mwonyago? Geuya nyeoseokdeulbodaneun naega hwolssin seoldeukryeok isseunikka. Nae malgwa jumeogeun kkwae himi itneun pyeonigeodeun.
|vo_07_03_tl         = As I made the "Law" of the Arataki Gang, everyone should act abiding by the law. Hmm? What's the reason for them obediently listening to me? It's becamse I'm more persuasive than the guys. My words and fist have quite some power.

|vo_07_04_title      = 흥미있는 일…
|vo_07_04_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_04_tx         = 신사에 전해지는 설법에 따르면, 울림풀을 고리 모양으로 엮어 몸에 지니면 액운을 쫓고 행운이 온대. 넌 이 말 믿어? 난 울림풀의 마비 효과가 더 실용적이라고 생각하는데
|vo_07_04_rm         = Sinsae jeonhaejineun seolbeobe ttareumyeon, Ullimpureul gori moyang'euro yeokkeo mome jinimyeon aeguneul jjotgo haeng'uni ondae. Neon i mal mideo? Nan Ullimpure mabi hyogwaga deo siryongjeogirago saenggakhaneunde.
|vo_07_04_tl         = According to a legend that is told at the shrine, if you wear a ring of Naku Weed on your body, you can chase away bad luck and bring good luck. Do you believe this? I think the paralyzing effect of Naku Weed is more practical.

|vo_08_01_title      = 라이덴 쇼군에 대해…
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_quest      = Transient Dreams
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About the [[Raiden Shogun]]
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Raiden Shogun.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 쇄국령이 풀리고 라이덴 쇼군은 각 업계의 발전을 지원하는 법령을 잇따라 반포했어. 이제 내가 쇄국령 기간에 땄던 자격증들도 쓸 수 있고, 아라타키파도 경제적으로 그렇게 쪼들리지 않게 됐어…. 인생사 새옹지마라더니, 결국 라이덴 쇼군한테 고마워하게 될 날이 올 줄이야
|vo_08_01_rm         = Swaegukryeong'i pulligo Raiden Syoguneun gak eopgye-ui baljeoneul jiwonhaneun beopryeong'eul it'ttara banpohaesseo. Ije naega swaegukryeong gigane ttatdeon jagyeokjeungdeuldo sseul su itgo, Aratakipado gyeongjejeogeuro geureoke jjodeulliji anke dwaesseo... Insaengsa saeongjimaradeoni, gyeolguk Raiden Syogunhante gomawohage doel nari ol juriya.
|vo_08_01_tl         = After the Sakoku Degree, Raiden Shogun promulgated laws to support the development of each industry one after the other. Now I can use the licenses I obtained when the Sakoku Degree was held, and the Arataki Gang is economically secure... As people say in life, there are ups and downs, I didn't expect a day where I thanked the Raiden Shogun.

|vo_08_02_title      = 쿠죠 사라에 대해…
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Kujou Sara]]
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kujou Sara.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 쿠죠 씨는 내 친구야. 응? 내가 쿠죠 씨랑 아는 사이인 게 그렇게 의외야? 아, 뭔가 오해했나 본데, 아라타키파에 들어오기 전부터 친분이 있었어. 우리 둘의 대결은 아직 승부가 안 났지
|vo_08_02_rm         = Kujyo ssineun nae chin'guya. Eung? Naega Kujyo ssirang aneun sai'in ge geureoke uioeya? A, mwonga ohaehaetna bonde, Aratakaipae deureo'ogi jeonbuteo chinbuni isseoseo. Uri durui daegyeoreun ajik seungbuga an natji.
|vo_08_02_tl         = Ms. Kujou is my friend. Huh? Is it that surprising that I know her? Oh, you must have misunderstood something, but we were close even before I joined the Arataki Gang. The match between the two of us hasn't been decided yet.

|vo_08_03_title      = 야에 미코에 대해…
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Yae Miko]]
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yae Miko.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 나루카미 다이샤의 궁사님마저 부업을 소일거리로 삼을 정도니, 무녀가 얼마나 지루한 직업인지 대충 짐작이 갈 거야. 내가 다시 무녀가 되는 일은 절대 없어
|vo_08_03_rm         = Narukami Daisya-ui gungsanimmajeo bueobeul soilgeoriro sameul jeongdoni, munyeoga eolmana jiruhan jigeobinji daechung jimjagi gal geoya. Naega dasi munyeoga doeneun ireun jeoldae eopsseo.
|vo_08_03_tl         = Even the Guuji of the Narukami Shrine make her sideline as pastime, you can guess how much boring it is to be a Shrine Maiden. Me being a Shrine Maiden will never happen again.

|vo_08_04_title      = 아라타키 이토에 대해…
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Arataki Itto]]
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Arataki Itto.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 형님은 썩 유쾌하지 않은 과거를 겪었지만, 늘 밝고 유쾌한 모습을 유지하고 있어. 쉽지 않은 일이야. 우리한테도 무척 잘해주시지. 형님의 그런 순수함이 아라타키파의 모두를 감화시킨 거야. 물론, 그게 형님이 다른 사람에게 막무가내로 굴어도 된다는 구실이 될 순 없어. 그가 너한테 폐 끼치면 언제든지 알려줘. 너한테 무례하게 군 걸 후회하게 해줄 테니까
|vo_08_04_rm         = Hyeongnimeun sseok yukwaehaji anneun gwagoreul gyeokkeotjiman, neol balkko yukwaehan moseubeul yujihago isseo. Swipji anneun iriya. Urihantedo mucheok jalhaejusiji. Hyeongnim-ui geureon sunsuhami Aratakipa-ui modureul gamhwasikin geoya. Mullon, geuge hyeongnimi dareun saramege makmuganaero gureodo doendaneun gusiri doel sun eopsseo. Geuga neohante pye kkichimyeon eonjedeunji allyeojwo. Neohante muryehage gun geol huhoehage haejul tenikka.
|vo_08_04_tl         = He didn't have a good past, but he always keeps a bright and enthusiastic front. It's not an easy thing. He also takes care of us well. The pureness of him influced everyone of the Arataki Gang. Of course, that shouldn't be the justification for him to act as he wants to others. If he bothers you, tell me anytime. I'll make him regret that he was rude to you.

|vo_08_05_title      = 연비에 대해…
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Yanfei]]
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yanfei.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = 그땐 가족과 사이가 틀어져서 될수록 멀리 도망가려는 생각뿐이었어. 그래서 법을 배우러 리월에 갔고 덕분에 연비 선배를 알게 됐지. 선배는 법률 자문 쪽으로는 걸어 다니는 백과사전이나 다름없어. 나? 자격증은 땄지만, 이 직업도 제약이 이만저만이 아니라서 말이지…. 나한테 딱 맞는 직업은 아냐
|vo_08_05_rm         = Geuttaen gajokgwa saiga teureojyeoseo doelsurok meolli domanggaryeoneun saenggakppunieosseo. Geuraeseo bobeul baeureo Riwore gatgo deokbune Yeonbi seonbaereul alge dwaetji. Seonbaeneun beopryul jamun jjogeuroneun georeo danineun baekgwasajeonina dareumeopsseo. Na? Jagyeokjeung'eun ttatjiman, i jigeopdo jeyagi imanjeomani aniraseo mariji... Nahante ttak matneun jigeobeun anya.
|vo_08_05_tl         = At that time, I fell out with my family, so I only thought about running away as much as I could. So I went to Liyue to learn about law and I got to know senior Yanfei. She is like a walking encyclopedia for legal advice. Me? I got a license, but this job is also very restrictive... It's not the best job for me.

|vo_08_06_title      = 시카노인 헤이조에 대해…
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Shikanoin Heizou]]
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Shikanoin Heizou.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 그는 평범한 텐료 봉행 도신 병사들과 달라. 그 사람이 순찰하거나 범인을 체포하는 걸 단 한 번도 본 적이 없거든. 가끔 나한테 정보를 사가곤 하는데, 정보를 주는 대신 봉행소에서 사람을 빼낼 때 잘 좀 말해달라고 부탁하면 흔쾌히 승낙하더라고. 꽤 괜찮은 거래야. 형제들한테 거리에서 정보를 수집하라고 하는 건 아주 쉽거든
|vo_08_06_rm         = Geuneun pyeongbeomhan Tenryo Bonghaeng dosin byeongsadeulgwa dalla. Geu sarami sunchalhageona beomineul chepohaneun geol dan han beondo bon jeogi eopgeodeun. Gakkeum nahante jeongboreul sagagon haneunde, jeongboreul juneun daesin bonghaengsoeseo sarameul ppaenael ttae jal jom malhaedallago butakhamyeon heunkwaehi seungnakhadeorago. Kkwae gwaenchaneun georaeya. Hyeongjedeulhante georieseo jeongboreul sujipharago haneun geon aju swipgeodeun.
|vo_08_06_tl         = He is different from the ordinary Tenryou Commission soldiers. I've never seen him patrolling or arresting a criminal. Sometimes he buys information from me, and instead of giving him information, he readily agrees when I ask him to get someone out of the Commission Headquarters. It's a pretty good deal. It's very easy to ask my brothers to gather information on the streets.

|vo_09_01_title      = 쿠키 시노부에 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 난 다양한 일을 해봤고 관련 자격증도 적지 않게 가지고 있어. 관리 쪽으로는 작은 팀을 맡아서 인원 관리와 자원 조달을 담당한 적이 있고…. 어, 미안, 면접을 많이 보다 보니 또 버릇이 도졌네. 신경 쓰지 마
|vo_09_01_rm         = Nan dayanghan ireul haebwatgo gwanryeon jagyeokjeungdo jeokji anke gajigo isseo. Gwanri jjogeuroneun jageun timeul mataseo inwon gwanriwa jawon jodareul damdanghan jeogi itgo... Eo, mian, myeonjobeul mani boda boni tto beoreusi dojyeotne. Sin'gyeong sseuji ma.
|vo_09_01_tl         = I've done various jobs and have a lot of related licenses. I've been in charge of staffing and resource procurement in a small team... Oh, I'm sorry, I've gotten into my habit after a lot of interviews. No need to care much about it.

|vo_09_02_title      = 쿠키 시노부에 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 우리 집은 대대로 무녀 가문이지만, 난 무녀에는 썩 어울리지 않아. 막 도망 나왔을 때 혼자서도 먹고 살 수 있게 많은 경험을 했어. 요리, 재봉, 격투, 법률 자문, 출판 편집 같은 것들을… 죄다 배웠었지. 막상 사회에 들어서고 보니 이 정도로도 충분하겠더라고
|vo_09_02_rm         = Uri jibeun daedaero munyeo gamunijiman, nan munyeoeneun sseok eoulliji ana. Mak domang nawasseul ttae honjaseodo meokgo sal su itge maneun gyeongheomeul haesseo. Yori, jaebong, gyeoktu, beopryul jamun, chulpan pyeonjip gateun geotdeureul... joeda baewosseotji. Maksang sahoe'e deureoseogo boni i jeongdorodo chungbunhagetdeorago.
|vo_09_02_tl         = My family has been a Shrine Maiden family for generations, but I don't fit as a Shrine Maiden. When I just ran away, I had a lot of experience to make a living on my own. I learned all of... cooking, sewing, fighting, legal advice, publishing editing. When I entered society, this was actually enough.

|vo_09_03_title      = 쿠키 시노부에 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 내 사교성이 뛰어나다고? 하하… 오랫동안 밖에서 떠돌이 생활을 해와서인지 눈치 하나는 더럽게 빠르지. 게다가 손해 보는 건 대부분 우리거든. 그런 표정을 짓는 걸 싫어하진 않지만, 될 수 있으면 안 웃는 걸 택하겠어
|vo_09_03_rm         = Nae sagyoseong'i ttwieonadago? Haha... oraetdong'an bakkeseo tteodori saenghwareul haewaseoinji nunchi hananeun deoreopge ppareuji. Gedaga sonhae boneun geon daebubun urigeodeun. Geureon pyojeong'eul jitneun geol sireohajin anchiman, doel su isseumyeon an utneun geol taekhagesseo.
|vo_09_03_tl         = I'm good at socializing? Haha... I've had a wanderer's life for a long time, so I'm very quick-witted. Besides, it's mostly us who suffer a loss. I don't hate making that face, but I'd rather not smile if I could.

|vo_09_04_title      = 쿠키 시노부에 대해 알기・네 번째
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 아라타키파에 막 들어왔을 때 형님이 나더러 부하들에게 싸우는 법을 가르치라고 했어. 그래서 내가 들어오고 나서 제일 처음 한 일이 바로 녀석들을 한 명씩 때려눕히는 거였지. 근데 다들 시퍼렇게 멍이 든 얼굴을 하고서도 눈을 동그랗게 뜨면서 날 「시노부 누님」이라고 부르더라고. 잘 부탁한다면서 말이야. 흥, 그때부터 이 녀석들이 답 없는 바보들이라는 걸 알았지. 하지만 괜찮아. 그 바보들이 내 발목을 잡을 일은 없어. 문제는 내가 다 해결하면 되니까
|vo_09_04_rm         = Aratakipae mak deureowasseul ttae hyeongnimi nadeoreo buhadeurege ssauneun beobeul gareuchirago haesseo. Geuraeseo naega deureo'ogo naseo jeil cheoeum han iri baro nyeoseokdeureul han myeongssik ttaeryeonuphineun geoyeotji. Geunde dadeul sipeoreoke meong'i deun eolgureul hagoseodo nuneul donggeuratge tteumyeonseo nal "Sinobu Nunim"irago bureudeorago. Jal butakhandamyeonseo mariya. Heung, geuttaebuteo i nyeoseokdeuri dap eopneun babodeuriraneun geol aratji. Hajiman gwaenchana. Geu babodeuri nae balmogeul jabeul ireun eopsseo. Munjeneun naega da haegyeolhamyeon doenikka.
|vo_09_04_tl         = When I just entered the Arataki Gang, he made me teach my underlings how to fight. So what I first did when I entered was to beat up them one by one. But they had wide eyes and called me "Big Sister Shinobu" even after having a badly bruised face. Saying they hope we get along well. Hmph, from then, I knew that they were hopeless idiots. But it's alright. There is no way that those idiots will chain me up. I can solve all the problems.

|vo_09_05_title      = 쿠키 시노부에 대해 알기・다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 아라타키파에 남기로 한 건 내 스스로 한 결정이야. 뒷수습하다 보면 종종 화가 치미는 건 사실이지만, 그들은 나한테 그 무엇과도 바꿀 수 없는 진심을 보여줬어…. 제일 좋은 물건은 나부터 준다든지, 절대 내 일에 초 치지 않는다든지, 결정 사항을 알리면 떠들썩하게 박수 치면서 휘파람을 불어준다든지…. 사람들이 아라타키파를 썩 좋게 보지 않는다는 건 알아. 멤버들은 별로 개의치 않지만, 난 노력해서 우리에 대한 사람들의 생각을 바꾸고 싶어. 「가족」이라는 게 나는 가끔 막 대해도 되지만, 남들이 뭐라 하는 꼴은 못 보는 법이잖아
|vo_09_05_rm         = Aratakipae namgiro han geon nae seuseuro han gyeoljeong'iya. Dwitsuseuphada bomyeon jongjong hwaga chimineun geon sasirijiman, geudeureun nahante geu mueotgwado bakkul su eopneun jinsimeul boyeojwosseo... Jeil joeun mulgeoneun nabuteo jundadeunji, jeoldae naeire cho chiji anneundadeunji, gyeoljeong sahang'eul allimyeon tteodeulsseokhage baksu chimyeonseo hwiparameul bureojundadeunji... Saramdeuri Aratakipareul sseok joke boji anneundaneun geon ara. Membeodeureun byeollo gaeuichi anchiman, nan noryeokhaeseo urie daehan saramdeure saenggageul bakkugo sipeo. "Gajok"iraneun ge naneun gakkeun mak daehaedo doejiman, namdeuri mwora haneun kkoreun mot boneun beobijana.
|vo_09_05_tl         = Staying in the Arataki Gang is a decision I made by myself. It's true that I often get angry when I clean up, but they showed me earnestness that I couldn't trade for anything... They give me the best stuff first, never putting it into my work, or giving me a big round of applause and whistles when I tell them decisions... I know people don't like the Arataki Gang very much. The members don't mind, but I want to try and change people's minds about us. "Family" is something I can sometimes treat recklessly, but I can't bear to see see what others say.

|vo_10_01_title      = 쿠키 시노부의 취미…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 평소에 아라타키파에 있으면서 할 일도 없고 하다 보니, 나도 모르게 책 한 권을 다 읽고 자격증을 따고 있더라고. 나름 괜찮지 않아? 가족들이 물어봐도 허송세월한 것도 아니고, 나가서 일할 밑천도 생기고. 뭐든 실력을 최우선으로 보는 이 세상에서 나처럼 자격증 가진 건달은 어딜 가든 배곯을 걱정은 안 해도 돼
|vo_10_01_rm         = Pyeongsoe Aratakipae isseumyeonseo hal ildo eopgo hada boni, nado moreuge chaek han gwoneul da ilkko jagyeokjeung'eul ttago itdeorago. Nareum gwaenchanchi ana? Gajokdeuri mureobwado heosongsewolhan geotdoanigo, nagaseo ilhal mitcheondo saenggigo. Mwodeun sillyeogeul choeuseoneuro boneun i sesang'eseo nacheoreom jagyeokjeung gajin geondareul eodil gadeun baegoreul geokjeong'eun an haedo dwae.
|vo_10_01_tl         = Since there is not much to do while staying in the Arataki Gang most of the time, I finished reading a book and got a license without knowing. Isn't it good? Even if my family asks me, I didn't waste my time, and I have a solid base to go out and work. In this world where people put skills first, a certified gangster like me don't have to worry about being hungry wherever I go.

|vo_10_02_title      = 쿠키 시노부의 고민
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = 전에는 무녀로 잡혀가기 싫은 마음에 혼자 힘으로 자리 잡으려 했어. 적어도 지금까진 꽤 잘하고 있는 것 같아
|vo_10_02_rm         = Jeoneneun munyeoro japhyeogagi sireun maeume honja himeuro jari jabeuryeo haesseo. Jeogeodo jigeumkkajin kkwae jalhago itneun geot gata.
|vo_10_02_tl         = Before, I tried to settle down on my own because I didn't want to be taken away as a Shrine Maiden. At least I'm doing pretty well so far.

|vo_10_03_title      = 좋아하는 음식…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = 라멘이나 교자처럼 든든한 음식을 먹어도 마지막은 쌀밥 한 그릇이 꼭 먹고 싶어져. 쌀밥 맛있잖아, 다른 이유는 없어. 뭐 문제 있어?
|vo_10_03_rm         = Ramenina gyojacheoreom deundeunhan eumsigeul meogeodo majimageun ssalbap han geureusi kkok meokgo sipeojyeo. Ssalbap masitjana, dareun iyuneun eopsseo. Mwo munje isseo?
|vo_10_03_tl         = Even if I eat full food like ramen or dumplings, I really want to eat a bowl of rice at the end. Rice is delicious, there's no other reason. Is there a problem?

|vo_10_04_title      = 싫어하는 음식…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = 요리사 자격증을 딴 후로 리월에서 들은 이 말을 더욱 믿게 됐어. 세상에 맛없는 요리는 없다. 형편없는 요리사만 있을 뿐
|vo_10_04_rm         = Yorisa jagyeokjeung'eul ttan huro Riworeseo deureun i mareul deouk mitge dwaesseo. Sesang'e madeopneun yorineun eopda. Hyeongpyeoneopneun yorisaman isseul ppun.
|vo_10_04_tl         = I've come to believe this sentence I've heard in Liyue more since I got my cook's license. There is no dish in the world that tastes bad. There are only terrible cooks.

<!-- Receiving a Gift -->
|vo_11_01_title      = 선물 획득・첫 번째
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = 제법이네. 크흠… 한 입만 더 먹을게
|vo_11_01_rm         = Jebobine. Keheum... ham ipman deo meogeulkke.
|vo_11_01_tl         = It's pretty good. Ehem... I'll have one more mouthful.

|vo_11_02_title      = 선물 획득・두 번째
|vo_11_02_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = 네가 만들었어? 음… 이 정도 실력이면 요리사 자격증도 충분히 따겠네
|vo_11_02_rm         = Nega mandeureosseo? Eum... i jeongdo sillyeogimyeon yorisa jagyeokjeungdo chungbunhi ttagetne.
|vo_11_02_tl         = Did you make it? Hmm... with this skill, you can get a cook license.

|vo_11_03_title      = 선물 획득・세 번째
|vo_11_03_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = 솔직히 물어볼게. 조미료 잘못 넣은 거 아니야?
|vo_11_03_rm         = Soljikhi mureobolkke. Jomiryo jalmot neoeun geo aniya?
|vo_11_03_tl         = Let me ask you honestly. Did you add the wrong seasoning?

<!-- Birthday -->
|vo_12_01_title      = 생일…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = 생일 축하해. 자, 이 특제 울림풀 표창 선물로 줄게. 조심해, 그래. 맞아, 그렇게 잡는 거야…. 던지기 전에 궤적 계산하는 거 잊지 말고…. 하하, 마음에 든다니 다행이네. 아, 장난감 취급하진 마. 위험한 건 사실이니까. 연습하고 싶다면 내가 도와줄게
|vo_12_01_rm         = Saeng'il chukhahae. Ja, i teukje Ullimpul pyochang seonmullo julge. Josimhae, geurae. Maja, geureoke japneun geoya... Deonjigi jeone gwejeok gyesanhaneun geo itji malgo... Haha, maeume deundani dahaeng'ine. A, jangnangam chwigeuphajin ma. Wiheomhan geon sasirinikka. Yeonseuphago sipdamyeon naega dowajulge.
|vo_12_01_tl         = Happy birthday. I'll give you this special Naku Weed dagger as a present. Be careful, yeah. That's right. That's how you grab it.. Don't forget to calculate the trajectory before throwing... Haha, I'm glad you like it. Oh, don't treat it like a toy. It's true that it's dangerous. I'll help you if you want to practice.

<!-- Feelings About Ascension -->
|vo_13_01_title      = 돌파의 느낌・기
|vo_13_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = 기본기가 부족하면 다른 건 더 논할 필요도 없어. 그래서 초급 자격증이 필요한 거지
|vo_13_01_rm         = Gibongiga bujokhamyeon dareun geon deo nonhal piryodo eopsseo. Geuraeseo chogeup jagyeokjeung'i piryohan geoji.
|vo_13_01_tl         = If you lack the basics, there is no need to discuss anything else. That's why you need a beginner's license.

|vo_13_02_title      = 돌파의 느낌・승
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = 중급 자격증을 손에 넣으면 대부분 일을 순조롭게 처리할 수 있어. 내가 뭐 도와줄 일 없어?
|vo_13_02_rm         = Junggeop jagyeokjeung'eul sone neoemyeon daebubun ireul sunjoropge cheorihal su isseo. Naega mwo dowajul il eopsseo?
|vo_13_02_tl         = If you get an intermediate level license, you can handle most work smoothly. Is there anything I can do to help you?

|vo_13_03_title      = 돌파의 느낌・전
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = 고급 자격증은 쉽게 따낼 수 있는 게 아니야. 천부적인 재능과 실전을 통한 경험, 어느 것 하나 빼놓을 수 없지
|vo_13_03_rm         = Gogeup jagyeokjeung'eun swipge ttanael su itneun ge aniya. Cheonbujeogin jaeneunggwa silcheoneul tonghal gyeongheom, eoneu geot hana ppaenoeul su eopjji.
|vo_13_03_tl         = Advanced certificates are not easy to obtain. Natural talent and experience through practice, not one thing cannot be left out.

|vo_13_04_title      = 돌파의 느낌・결
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 자격증은 기술의 전문성을 따질 뿐, 거기에 쏟아부은 노력과 감정을 계량화할 수는 없어. 너와 내 친분도 고맙다는 말 한마디로 설명할 수 있는 게 아니니까, 행동으로 증명할게. 이건 내 특기지
|vo_13_04_rm         = Jagyeokjeung'eun gisure jeonmunseong'eul ttajil ppun, geogie ssodabueun noryeokgwa gamjeong'eul gyeranghwahal suneun eopsseo. Neowa nae chinbundo gomapdaneun mal hanmadiro seolmyeonghal su itneun ge aninikka, haengdong'euro jeungmyeonghalge. Igeon nae teukgiji.
|vo_13_04_tl         = A license only counts the expertise of said skills, but it cannot quantify the effort and emotion that you put into it. I can't say thank you in one word, so I'll prove it with my actions. This is my specialty.
}}
